name: dbpedia_14
instruction: Classify the subject based on the title and content into one of the 14 categories: company, educational institution, artist, athlete, office holder, mean of transportation, building, natural place, village, animal, plant, album, film, written work.
instruction_2: Read the title and content, then determine the appropriate category among the 14 options: album, plant, athlete, animal, film, village, artist, building, educational institution, office holder, natural place, company, written work, mean of transportation.
